name: flick-monorepo

scripts.build: bun run build:runtime && bun run build:compiler && bun run build:router && bun run build:vite-plugin && bun run build:create-app
scripts.build:runtime: cd packages/runtime && bunx tsc && bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --minify --target browser
scripts.build:compiler: cd packages/compiler && bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node
scripts.build:vite-plugin: cd packages/vite-plugin && bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node --external @babel/core --external @flickjs/compiler
scripts.build:create-app: cd packages/create-app && bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node
scripts.build:deploy: bun run build:landing && bun run docs:build && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/docs && cp -r packages/landing/dist/* dist/ && cp -r packages/docs/.vitepress/dist/* dist/docs/
scripts.publish:all: bun run build && cd packages/runtime && npm publish --tag beta && cd ../compiler && npm publish --tag beta && cd ../router && npm publish --tag beta && cd ../vite-plugin && npm publish --tag beta && cd ../create-app && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:dry: bun run build && cd packages/runtime && npm publish --dry-run --tag beta && cd ../compiler && npm publish --dry-run --tag beta && cd ../router && npm publish --dry-run --tag beta && cd ../vite-plugin && npm publish --dry-run --tag beta && cd ../create-app && npm publish --dry-run --tag beta
scripts.version:update: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const version = process.argv[1]; ['runtime', 'compiler', 'router', 'vite-plugin', 'create-app'].forEach(pkg => { const path = './packages/' + pkg + '/package.json'; const json = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path)); json.version = version; fs.writeFileSync(path, JSON.stringify(json, null, 2) + '\\n'); });"

description: Flick - A tiny reactive UI framework with fine-grained reactivity
author: Jay Malave
